name: Derora
description: Set in a beautiful world and designed solely for VR, Derora is a captivating puzzle game and competitive climbing experience. Throw, grab and hop your way through each layer of the mystical rainforest, creating your own path to get back to your nest.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater Network: Broadband Internet connection
